Rooms.Policy:
Cancellation policy: For a reservation of 1 to 3 room/nights, we require 72 hours (3 days) notice, for a reservation of 4 to 6 room/nights, we require 1 week (7 days) notice, for a reservation of 7 or more room/nights, we require 2 weeks (14 days) notice, otherwise:

For a reservation of 1 to 3 nights => one night will be charged.
For a reservation of 4 to 6 nights => two nights will be charged
For a reservation of 7 or more nights => three nights will be charged
There is a $25 (plus tax) service fee per room cancelled or shortened at ANY TIME.

No Show: If you fail to show up to occupy a reserved room on your scheduled arrival date, then the reservation becomes void for the remaining nights that have been reserved, and any room/nights that we are unable to re-book become due and payable, including any applicable taxes.

ANY changes to a reservation will be confirmed by us in writing (e.mail, fax or regular mail).
Refund policy: Partial
Free cancellation until: 2019-05-18 23:59:59 UTC
